title: Weekend Special
description: Get 20% off your entire order every Saturday and Sunday
terms: Valid on weekends only. Cannot be combined with other offers.

title: New Customer Welcome
terms: Valid for new customers only. One-time use per customer.

title: Coffee Roasting Tour
description: Free coffee with roasting tour booking
terms: Must book roasting tour in advance. Free coffee valid same day as tour.

title: Early Bird Special
description: Buy 2 breakfast items, get 1 free before 9 AM
terms: Valid before 9 AM only. Lowest priced item is free.

title: Live Music Night
description: 50% off all beverages during live music performances
terms: Valid during live music performances only. Check schedule for performance times.

title: Halloween Treat
description: Spooky 25% off all pumpkin spice items
terms: Valid on pumpkin spice menu items only. Limited time offer.
